name: LaboratoryTestMRSP
title: Labortest für Middle-East-Respiratory-Syndrome-Coronavirus (MERS-CoV)
description: Das ValueSet LaboratoryTestMRSP enthält die Codes der Labortests für Middle-East-Respiratory-Syndrome-Coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
